field.name: competition_id
field.query: SELECT competition.id, CONCAT( event.name, ' - ' , competition_type.name ) as event_competition_name FROM #__swa_competition AS competition INNER JOIN #__swa_event AS event ON competition.event_id=event.id INNER JOIN #__swa_competition_type AS competition_type ON competition.competition_type_id=competition_type.id
field.label: Competition
